name: NoCodes
description: Qonversion No-Codes SDK is a standalone software development kit designed to help you build and customize paywall screens without writing code. It allows seamless integration of pre-built subscription UI components, enabling a faster and more flexible way to design paywalls directly within your app. While it operates independently, the No-Codes SDK relies on the Qonversion SDK as a dependency to handle in-app purchases and subscription management.
